sub_title: Global Quality Specialist/Global ISQM 1 Lead/Head of Root Cause Analysis/Audit and Assurance/Professional Services/FCA/MBA(Hons) French and German Literature
summary: I am a Chartered Accountant with specialist experience in audit and quality, specifically ISQM 1 and Root Cause Analysis.  Currently working as Global ISQM 1 lead for Grant Thornton International and previously worked as Head of Root Cause Analysis for Grant Thornton UK LLP.  I am fluent in English and French, strong Dutch, conversational German, Italian and Spanish.

profile_positions.description:
- Leading change and project management for the network, consisting of firms in over 130 different countries, to ensure ready for ISQM 1 effective date
- Developing and managing an ISQM 1 readiness tracking system including monitoring and escalation
- Designing and leading both quarterly technical training sessions and Q&A sessions across time zones and in multiple languages
- Driving leadership awareness through presentations to Global Leadership Team, member firm CEOs, Heads of Assurance and Heads of service lines
profile_positions.title: Global ISQM 1 Lead

profile_positions.description:
- I am the firm's expert in Root Cause Analysis and first point of contact for any matters related to Root Cause.
- I have built up the Root Cause Analysis function from its infancy, developing relationships with regulators, the FRC and ICAEW, together with Grant Thornton International and my colleagues in member firms.  I have used the insights gained from these relationships together with professional training, to develop and improve the function, continually striving for best practice.
- I both organise and perform Root Cause Analysis on the results of audit inspection quality reviews and thematic investigations, identifying and driving appropriate actions to mitigate the root causes identified in order to continually improve the quality of the work we perform and enable the replication of good practice.  
- I communicate on a regular basis with the Public Interest Committee and Audit Quality Board, together with sharing knowledge on a firm-wide, team-wide and individual basis.    I am a member of the Audit Quality Academy Steering committee for Assurance and use my insights to influence the structure and content of professional development for the Assurance practice, and in some cases firm-wide.
- I also have experience as an inspector for audit quality monitoring on both internal and international reviews.
profile_positions.title: Head of Root Cause Analysis

profile_positions.description:
- I currently manage a portfolio that includes both small businesses and listed companies across a wide range of industries.
- I am also involved in operations within the department, running a variety of projects from training and integration for new managers to initiatives to improve the department as a whole.
- As a line manager, I am also responsible for the training and development of my line students, including their performance appraisals.
profile_positions.title: Senior Audit Manager

profile_positions.description:
My job entails:

- Review of local business, strata, captive insurance and mutual fund audits among others.
- Human resources manager, responsible for staffing including interviews, training, staff appraisals and job allocations for the office.
- WCA (World Class Auditing) leader for the office; the key contact between Grant Thornton worldwide and the Cayman office for the electronic audit system, including training, software maintenance, upgrade roll-outs and the annual update of Grant Thornton’s audit manual.
- Team leader of international quality reviews for Grant Thornton Jamaica and team member for Canada (Quebec), discussed findings with audit teams and presented results to audit leaders.
- Performed the Internal quality control review for the Cayman office and reported findings to Grant Thornton International.
- Communication with existing and potential clients, staff, other offices and regulatory authorities including presentations at board meetings and preparation of proposals for work.
- IT representative for the Cayman office.
- Established marketing initiatives, including introducing the sponsorship of the IMAC luncheon, client lunches, improving client service and following up on prospective client leads.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager

profile_positions.description:
My experience included:

•	Responsibility for all aspects of NAV preparation for both onshore and offshore funds, including multi-currency and master-feeder structures, covering US$1.5bn of assets.
•	Experience of Anti Money Laundering and Know Your Customer requirements.
•	Financial statements preparation for both onshore, offshore and multi-currency funds.
•	Experience of foreign currency hedging.
•	First point of contact for investors and investment managers, producing reports and assimilating extra information where required.
profile_positions.title: Fund Accountant

profile_positions.description: My responsibilities included managing quality control and customer service to maintain a five star service, being responsible for the allocation of work to 45 staff and solving day to day staffing problems and liaising with suppliers and customers as the company’s translator.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Resort Manager

profile_positions.description:
My experience included:

- Graded Exceptional Performer.

- Internal audit work, including drafting reports for the audit committee, preparing statutory accounts for publication and leading debrief meetings with the client.
